label: 非常赦
対訳語: amnesty The freeing or pardoning of criminals. Several kinds.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: hijōsha (extraordinary amnesty), when all criminals were pardoned, 2. taisha (great amnesty), when all but the worst criminals were freed, and even the worst had their sentences lightened, 3. onsha (minor amnesty), when those who were to be executed or exiled had their sentences lightened one degree.
